…``1980B. Periodic review of automatic maximum coverage.''.

Mr. BOST.  970.

Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of H.R. 970 offered by my  colleague from Washington (Ms. Strickland).

H.R. 970 would require the VA to regularly review and compare the  maximum coverage for VA life insurance programs to keep them in line  with the average cost-of-living…
